website_summaries.verdict: Very specialized and more of a car-camping oven, this option does a good job cooking pizza, as well as stuffed dough foods like Stromboli and calzones.
pros: Takes 15 minutes to preheat it, and another six minutes to cook a pizza
Steel construction, with an included 14-inch cordierite pizza stone
Also very good for cooking Stromboli and calzones
Heats up and maintains heat well
cons: Some buyers had problems getting this option to cook well, getting it to heat up hot enough, and getting the pizza in and out of the oven in one piece
Doesn't come with a pizza peel

website_summaries.verdict: A good entry-level outdoor pizza maker.
pros: Preheats and is ready for cooking in 15 min
Makes crisp oven-style pizzas in just 6 min
Propane-fueled and portable for tailgating, camping, or any adventure
Includes adapter for use with 20 lb
You can use it for multiple pizzas in a short time by lining the stone with parchment paper and cornmeal
cons: Timing and doneness can be affected by crust thickness, toppings, and weather conditions

customer_reviews.title: All that reading.. all the research..
customer_reviews.text: After you are done reading the "technical" reviews.. go ahead and hit "add to cart" and then "proceed to checkout". This simple review will speak for itself after you see all the "thank you" responses below.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L.

customer_reviews.title: Half the price I paid but I would still buy it today at the old price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my pizzaque almost 2 years ago and have not made a pizza in my indoor oven ever since. I can not believe this is now selling for about half the price of what I paid....Even today, I would still pay what I paid then but less than $100 is insane! Anyone who loves making pizza and doesnt own one of these for their home does not know what they are missing. I have turned out hundreds and hundreds of pizzas that are better than restaurant quality. In fact, when relatives book their trips to visit us they always include 2 Fridays just so they can experience my pizza nights twice during their visit!
customer_reviews.author: K Mel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pizza oven!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this oven and have used it several times. Gives our pizza a whole different taste than 'kitchen oven' baked pizza. It's easy to use and the doesn't take up a lot of space. Be sure to order the legs and accessories. They really add to the convenience and ease of use of this oven. Our first pizza wouldn't release from the pizza peel so we placed the next one on parchment paper. Halfway through the baking time of about 6 minutes, we remove the paper and turn the pizza about half way. Perfect pizza every time!
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Pizza Oven that heats to 700-900F (temps needed for GREAT Pizza)
customer_reviews.text: This little Pizza oven cooks pizza very fast. I have been looking for an oven that heated up like the commercial ovens. Never could seem to find one that did the trick and was priced reasonably. This oven is GREAT, did i just use caps like I am yelling yes i did! Super easy to setup and run. Brought this oven over to my daughters house and we had a pizza party. You will need the Pizza Peel that is metal like they sell or one like it. A wooden one just won't work that well although i use a large wooden peel to place pizza on after it comes out of the oven to cut and serve.
customer_reviews.author: StarMan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the part time pizza enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is good but not great. It definitely gets up to temp of about 700. The opening isn’t all that big and you’re really only going to get pizzas in this thing. Toasting subs isn’t really possible. It is great at heating up old pizza though. Very easy to assemble and move around. I can definitely see us taking this to the park or tailgates for something different. It’s a great experience to have pizza night with the kids and everyone gets their own pie. Will this turn you into a master Neapolitan? No. Will you make some great pies and be the hero of your family? Potentially. For the money, this thing can’t be beat though.
customer_reviews.author: Al Dub

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good if you are willing to use a couple workarounds.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well but you need to be aware of 2 things. The door causes the front to be much cooler than the back, so you have to spin the pizza while cooking. The temperature of the stone is too hot compared to the temperature above, so I use a 12" pizza screen which makes it just about perfect top vs. bottom temperatures. If you like your crust chewy you can use a pan instead of screen.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Striker

customer_reviews.title: Pizza party time!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing this pizza oven for over a year maybe two years. Brought as Christmas gift for myself. Finally tried it out tonight and the pizzas were great. I put my pizza on parchment paper and removed after 2-3 mins which worked well for me. Can't wait to have a pizza party!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Magic.
customer_reviews.text: Best thin crust (Neapolitan-style) pizza you can make at home without building a wood-fired oven. 10-minute heat up way beyond what your oven can ever do. Easy storage. Great for hot summer night cooking, as you don't heat up the kitchen! DO NOT LOOK IN OPENING WHEN LIGHTING if you prize your eyebrows. The instructions say this clearly. Listen to them.
customer_reviews.author: Freckles

customer_reviews.title: Consistent, fool proof pizza.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the charcoal BBQ conversion for a while but couldn't get consistent temps. Space prevents me from building my own for now so I decided that for $150, I'd get this as an interim. First pizza I pulled out told me it was worth every penny. I made four pizzas the day it arrived and they were all leopard spotted happiness. It will take a little tweaking to get the toppings to match my doneness preference but I'm very pleased with it straight out of the box. I was getting center stone temps of about 650* with ambient temps in the upper 70s and a light breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun, honestly.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of fun with this. I even ordered the Natural Gas conversion kit for it, so it's going to be a permanent part of the backyard. It is tricky to learn how to make crusts that don't stick to the peel putting them into the unit. The slit is necessarily small to retain heat, and it makes it trickier to load the oven compared to a traditional stone, wood fired oven. But for 10x less cost the results are almost identical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to assemble, works well.  Need cooking items that must be purchased separately.
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky getting the few screws started, but pretty easy to assemble. I've made about 15 pizzas so far. I added a 'backstop' behind the pizza stone to prevent pizza from sliding off the back side of the stone. If you're careful, probably not necessary. Gets plenty hot to bake a nicely browned crust, much better than a typical oven. You will need a brush to clean the stone, a board to assemble pizza on and slide into oven, and a large pizza spatula to turn and remove the cooked pizza, all available separately.
customer_reviews.author: woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Homemade DELICIOUS pizza is just a click away!
customer_reviews.text: What a terrific way to cook GREAT pizza, outdoors. This pizza oven is perfect. Cooks evenly, is easy to put together (attach legs/stand and buy a bottle of propane) Bought a bigger cover (from another purchase) because the cover that comes with it looks like a shower cap and is in the wind in no time, but that's the only complaint. Great pizza oven, easy to set up, simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Homemade Pizza
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I love pizza but it's hard to get a home oven hot enough to make decent pizza. I decided to try this and was very pleased. It gets very hot pretty quickly. Cooks pizzas in just a few minutes. The only other thing you need is a pizza peel. I use a wood one to put the pizza in and a metal one to turn the pizza and remove it from the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! I love this thing. Well worth the money. 10-15 minute warm up and pizza in 6:30 minutes. Sits on my covered deck ready to go whenever I've made dough. At 3:15 I rotate the pie 180 and cook, usually, about another 3:15. I do cook my pies in a pan. The few I've made without the pan cook a few minute faster. You'll have to pry my Pizzaque from my cold dead hands!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Fog

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment! Perfect addition to backyard! Bought one for myself and loved it so much, bought two more as gifts! Quick setup, easy to use and now we can eat pizza in the summer time without heating up entire house using oven! Perfect for parties and even tailgating!
customer_reviews.author: JOSLYN

customer_reviews.title: Fun item 5 stars for cust Service and QC
customer_reviews.text: This time of year in winter it’s tuff to get the oven to stay at 650 but NOT impossible. This oven can produce pretty darn good pies especially if your dough is good. Nice charred bubbly pizza in the manner of NYC Recommend an infrared temp gun and aluminum screen pizza tray (seasoned) Also the legs that sell for about $25 are good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PIZZA OVEN !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This really a great product!!!! I would have given it 5stars but the ignitor does not work really great it Sparks but doesn't light the gas easily. I use your typical hand held starter I just stick in there and light it. But as far as the pizza it makes it's really good ! Takes about 6 to 7 minutes to bake the pizza. If you want the darker crispy crust bake at 700 degrees if you are like my wife and is not a fan of the crispy crust then I suggest 600 degrees . This little oven really gives you the taste of brick oven pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great for shop pizza parties
customer_reviews.text: works great for shop pizza parties. Much better than a oven pizza. It gets up to 750 degrees pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: TeamAlbaRacing

customer_reviews.title: PIZZZZAAAAAA!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My love for pizza has only been intensified with this oven. I no longer have to go to fancy Italian restaurants to get the type of thin crunchy and bubbly crust I yearn for. Some assembly is required, but as a 30 y/o women, I don't think it should be a major inconvenience. The directions were simple and easy to follow. I used the oven twice in one day when I first got it. It arrived on time and no damage or missing parts. I would highly recommend this product for any pizza lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Chan

customer_reviews.title: Acts like a reluctant bbq. Trouble getting it started.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who has gone out to start their "auto start" BBQ and have it click, click, click will know where this is going. The brand new unit is very finicky to start. Called tech support and they recommended moving the wire closer. While on the phone, it started. Hung up and a minute later, the dreaded click, then another click and another click...and then the odor of gas. They are not the only ones who have starter issues so I am not throwing it out, but it would be nice to be able to light it manually more easily, if these are common issues.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Moore

customer_reviews.title: It’s already paid for itself!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It’s already paid for itself! Since it was delivered a week ago, I’ve had 3 pizza parties and made a total of 38 awesome thin crust pizzas that baked in less than 6 min each! I haven’t gotten the temperature past 730 degrees and I haven’t really tried to, but I will update my review when and if I can get the temp up higher, because I was hoping to get it to 900 degrees in which case the pizzas would bake in about 1 min or so. The instructions don’t recommend heating it up past 700 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: 967tree4

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I've been looking for this for years..
customer_reviews.text: After many attempts at creating an even passable pie at home I had almost given up. Then along comes the PizzaQue! Such a basic design creates the perfect hot stone and high oven temp to make incredible pizza. My family loves the pizza from this oven. It takes some tinkering to get your dough right as well as on and off the peel, but once you have that down its perfect pizza after pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Pizza Oven
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes great pizza...I was making pizza on a stone in my oven in the kitchen for the longest time, but it would get so hot in the house due to the high temp of the oven... So I got one of these. Great choice! Once you get used to it and are careful with sliding your pizza inside to start, then turning to cook evenly, you'll never go back to a restaurant for pizza again. I also got the stand and cover to keep it on my back deck all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime L

customer_reviews.title: This is an Awesome pizza oven and does so much more!
customer_reviews.text: This is an Awesome pizza oven! When I first purchased it I didn't think I would use it as often as I have. Not only can you make great pizza. I have used it so far for Flat-breads, Pita bread, and an Outdoor oven for seafood. I love the PizzaQue.
customer_reviews.author: samjm1

customer_reviews.title: Takes a few tries to get it right
customer_reviews.text: Have used it twice now, the first time we had to move it into the garage as the wind kept blowing out the flame. Also found out the importance of using a lot of course cornmeal and a wooden spatula. Without both the dough sticks and is hard to get into the oven. The second time we were ready, the result was some really good pizza! Only takes about 6 minutes to cook. Don't forget to rotate about half way thru and don't push it too far back or the dough and toppings will fall down causing a "small" fire. Other than that, easy way to enjoy some quick, really good pizza
customer_reviews.author: M. Drossos

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit !
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good to start with. The packing and shipping seem to be more at fault than anything. Kinda looks like sabotauge. After all the promlems it did its job fed 20 at the scamp intl. moulded Fiberglass trailer rally in quartsite az. Neighbors loved it and the taste many just came by to see it. All the hassle has been worth it !!
customer_reviews.author: harrygenlund

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Well, what can I say. My family have rediscovered the joys of pizza! This little oven is fantastic. And you really don't need to be a pizza chef to make great pies in this little gem. I really have nothing to complain about on this oven. It is well designed ... every pie that has come out of this is fantastic. I don't think we will ever order carry out pizza again!
customer_reviews.author: Doob In NM

customer_reviews.title: Must have pizza oven!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Pizzacraft is amazing! We have been making pizza non stop since we purchased it! It was easy to put together and easy to use. We make our pizzas on parchment paper and put that on the pizza peel for easy delivery into the oven! No need for cornmeal or flour on your peel. This eliminates the problem people have with the pizza sticking to the peel. The crust is perfect and we get amazing pizza in 6 min! Also, the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I’ve ever made. This gas pizza oven cooks the best pizzas in about 5 min, turn it 180 degrees halfway through and they come out perfect (on high temp). It couldn’t be simpler. Experiment on your own if you are a pizza aficionado, but to my surprise the dough recipe in the manual came out really great. For the ease, quality, and price you won’t beat this pizza oven!
customer_reviews.author: Box315

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one to give as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: We love this pizza oven so much, that we bought another for our grandson, who's an aspiring chef! Everything is just as described...super quick heating and makes wonderful pizza's. We bought 6 12" pizza pans so that we can make up the pizzas ahead of time and throw them in the oven one-by-one. Great for parties!
customer_reviews.author: SKY

customer_reviews.title: good cooker
customer_reviews.text: use wire screens to put pizza on or you may have a mess. If you are careful and have the correct size pizza and very uniform it could work great. does make crispy crust and does get hot enough . does not cook the top very well mauybe turn it down half way and let it cook more. its a trial and error thing
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This is not a product I would recommend. The assembly is annoying, which I could dismiss, but it comes with no tool to insert the pizza.... so basically it comes as a worthless addition to the outdoor kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rae

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful oven
customer_reviews.text: I had some issues with this oven because it can be sensitive to wind but the company made me aware of the Pizza Oven Wind Door (also sold on Amazon) that is built specifically to address this issue. This is a terrific outdoor pizza oven.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance

customer_reviews.title: Makes great Pizzas
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza oven. Have used it a dozen times or so now and it is amazing. Cooks the pizzas very quickly. Very easy to set up and use. I love that its small enough to carry anywhere you want to go but also still makes great size pizzas. Highly recommend getting this if you enjoy making good homemade pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I can't complain.
customer_reviews.text: Once we put it together, it lit up the way the instructions said it would (make sure you read them). Once we had it warmed up, it cooked our small pizzas evenly and quickly. It did take some learning on how to get it off of the pizza paddle, but once that was mastered, we were making pizzas in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year and have used it as much as possible since. It gets really hot quick and cooks up a pizza in only a few minutes. I love crispy crust pizza and this surely can deliver that.
customer_reviews.author: Bobcore

customer_reviews.title: Very glad we decided to to buy this unit
customer_reviews.text: Very glad we decided to to buy this unit. It works great and we can use it for more than just pizza. More than worth the money. I do recommend the stand and the cover.
customer_reviews.author: americanwoman

customer_reviews.title: A Family HIT!!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift I have ever purchased for my husband!!! We live in an apartment and this fits perfectly in our small porch. We have the most delicious pizza every Saturday thanks to this Pizza Oven! So pleased with it! It makes amazing pizzas in such a quick time. It does get extremely hot so regular oven mits do NOT work. Make sure to purchase ones made for very hot temperatures. My husband loves making dinner now and we all reap the benefits! A family hit!!
customer_reviews.author: mommaof3

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: We have had this oven for 2 years and it works fantastic. Yes there is a learning curve. You have to adjust the cooking time and burner setting based on outdoor weather conditions. We use it at home on our deck and travel with it in our motorhome.........5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: RenP

customer_reviews.title: Makes Great Pizza
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes great pizza. It takes a few attempts to get it just right, but after that, you'll never cook pizza in a conventional oven again. It's easy to clean, and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: simonizer

customer_reviews.title: i spent a year trying to perfect homemade pizza
customer_reviews.text: what an improvement over my kitchen electric oven! i spent a year trying to perfect homemade pizza, experimenting with dough recipes, toppings, olive oils, different cheeses, etc. i finally found a total pizza recipe that worked for me but only after purchasing this pizzaque oven did i bring it to near commercial quality. the extra 200 degrees you can achieve with the pizzaque makes a major difference. wish i had bought it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Works awesome. Had pizza and even did a calzone with homemade dough, just cooked that on lower temp. 6 min cook time is not a lie and yes a must buy. It was a huge hit.. using it again for a group of 20 next week.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Kids and adults loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a party to make a bunch of pizzas. Precooked the dough in this and then made pizzas to order. Worked great and took about 2 mins per pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza oven for the price and taste!
customer_reviews.text: This pizza over is magic as is so small but mighty.... gets up to 600”-700” degrees in 5/7 min and bakes pizzas in less than 4/5 min to perfection... glad we got this one and not a very fancy expensive one!!
customer_reviews.author: Ralitza Bakita

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about how much we love this pizza oven. Mine easily Heats to 700 in 15 minutes but I burn less often if I cook at 500. If you have trouble inserting your dough then place it on parchment paper that you can easily peel off when done I had an expensive Italian pizza oven and I love this one even more.
customer_reviews.author: Doogren

customer_reviews.title: Make pizza equivalent to wood fired masterpieces.
customer_reviews.text: I host pizza night once per month and the pizza's that come out of this oven are equivalent to wood fired pizzas' found in small family restaurants throughout the French and Italian Riviera. Of course the chef had something to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: John's Orders

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had a lot of fun with this- it cooks delicious, wood-fired tasting pizzas right in your own back yard! It was easy to hook up and is simple to use. The whole family enjoys our pizza nights!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Makes fantastic pizza
customer_reviews.text: We struggled to get our oven hot enough in the house to make the perfect pizza. This Pizza Oven gets over 700 degrees in nothing flat. Cooks the crust perfectly. We love it. Now we have homemade pizza every Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Erno

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Outta The Box in 10 mins
customer_reviews.text: Simple to 'build' and setup. We're avid pizza grilling folks....bought this for football tailgating. It did not disappoint. Great pies...quick-cooking and people think we're crazy...and we are. You'll love it. Good value... Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Paul V

customer_reviews.title: These are the best affordable pizza ovens
customer_reviews.text: We own two of these and they are great. The two included stones hold the heat very well and deliver excellent crust. The oven will produce 700deg but I suggest you also purchase the optional metal opening cover to hold heat if its cold or windy.
customer_reviews.author: Pupcreek

customer_reviews.title: He was very pleased with this & has made some excellent pizzas in ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this item for my husband for Christmas. He was very pleased with this & has made some excellent pizzas in this oven. He is able to make pizzas in the summer on the back patio without heating up the house with the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this oven for a few weeks now and it works great. The mouth is wide enough and tall enough to have bulky pizzas put into and taken out. Easy to clean, easy to set up. The only thing you want to keep in mind is that it does take awhile for each pizza to cook. If you're doing a large party, say 5 or more pizzas, cook some beforehand. People get hungry!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina R.

customer_reviews.title: it's wonderful as a portable , easy to use oven for pizza
customer_reviews.text: made a few pies with this. works as advertised. temp was consistently around 650 inside. did not work as well as my wood fired oven but for a carry around oven i was happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Claudius

customer_reviews.title: Pizza craft pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: This little pizza craft oven is awesome Pizza, great I would recommend it to anybody that is looking for a little pizza oven
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This pizza oven is awesome! It took me about 20 minutes to set ...
customer_reviews.text: This pizza oven is awesome! It took me about 20 minutes to set up because I bought the leg kit to go with it. Fired it up and ran it for 20 minutes as suggested and it worked like a charm. See attached photos of my first pizza and my set up! Thank you Pizzacraft for creating a no brainer experience!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Cooks good pizzas
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. This pizza oven really makes a difference with that of oven cooked pizzas. Cooks good pizzas, will just need more practice & experience cooking with it. It should have came with the door, but you need to purchase it separately.
customer_reviews.author: Paully

customer_reviews.title: Lighting hazard beware!
customer_reviews.text: The lighting mechanism on this grill never worked right. I singed my sweater a few times even when following the instructions. I called the company but never was able to talk to anyone, left messages, etc. It cooks a great pizza but becareful!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great pizza!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a “very good” used one. It came without instructions and missing the control knob and a few screws. Fortunately YouTube had the instructions, I had the hardware on hand, and could start the oven & control the temp. with a pliers. I ordered a replacement knob from Pizzacraft. The oven worked great first time and I look forward to many more patio pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Siewert

customer_reviews.title: Great little oven
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works great as long as you don't pile the toppings to high and turn the pizza a few times
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Hot and fast
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great pizza oven. As soon as we got it we had some friends over for a pizza party and everyone loved it and the perfect pizzas. It heats up to 750 degrees in about 12 minutes and cooks a pizza in 5. Before we put the pizza on we make sure it has cornmeal on the dough to ensure it slides out easy and doesn't get baked on to the pizza stone.
customer_reviews.author: AdnoX

customer_reviews.title: We have used it as a family many times and enjoyed it! It makes great pizza and is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father for Christmas. We have used it as a family many times and enjoyed it! It makes great pizza and is easy to use. My father has taken it on camping trips as well and it was a hit with the group!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Locke

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: really nice product. works as advertised. 12" wire pans make the process very simple
customer_reviews.author: Capt Dave

customer_reviews.title: but we love it. It makes excellent pizza
customer_reviews.text: We can only use this outdoors, but we love it. It makes excellent pizza, and we love making our own pizza. I would buy another one if I had to buy one. Its lasted us at least two years so far, so good quality.
customer_reviews.author: kaleb and Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Portable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This oven is great. Once I was able to get the pizza into the oven, everything went very smoothly. The directions were easy to follow and resulted in a crispy, perfectly cooked pie. The assembly was easy after I read the directions. The only complaint is that while it is portable, it is roughly 25 pounds and very awkward to carry.
customer_reviews.author: lumes

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy. If I had to pick something to ...
customer_reviews.text: We've used our oven countless times since we bought it. Had a pizza party for our son's 1st birthday and was making pizzas constantly for about 2 hours, never had any issues. This was a great buy. If I had to pick something to criticize it for -- I wish it were bigger.
customer_reviews.author: W. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza oven!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this pizza over! Be prepared- there is a small learning curve to getting your pizzas right- but it’s more about the dough than the oven. My brother-in-law has this, and we loved it so much we got one of our own :)
customer_reviews.author: Alli B

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Just not for me, I purchased something else, I think its a good tailgate appliance
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Just made the best pizza of my life!
customer_reviews.text: This blows away cooking pizza in a regular oven. Just made the best tasting pizza ever.
customer_reviews.author: Boundary

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have had so much fun with is pizza oven once it was put together love it easy to cook in and operate once it is all together
customer_reviews.author: zachary lampitok

customer_reviews.title: Pizza fun
customer_reviews.text: Only used once. 20 degrees outside so it was difficult to heat with wind. Easy to assemble and portable. As a professional chef with over 40 years experience I say this little guy will be a great addition to our fun with pizzas
customer_reviews.author: Cher Fred

customer_reviews.title: Love this Pizza oven!...buying a second one!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pizza oven...going to buy a second one so we can crank them out for a crowd...in the summer we use it at our Cottage and everyone enjoys making their own pie....I come from a family who owns Pizza Shoppes so I know a good pizza and this oven makes a great one!...I use 00 flour from Italy that I buy here to make my own dough and it is fabulous!..I have friends that have very expensive pizza ovens they built in their back yards and this makes a pizza just as good as those... .would highly recommend 🍕😍🍕
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, if you are considering buying one, do it. Use lots of cornmeal and everything goes in and out easily. Makes the best crust ive ever had in a home made pizza.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pizza first time and every time
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Wonderful pizza first time and every time. Follow directions and you can't go wrong. We had a beautifully charred, crispy but chewy crust. No more hot kitchen in the summer for me. So, we can continue to enjoy homemade pizza, flat breads, cheesy breadsticks, etc., all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is really great for camping and tailgating
customer_reviews.text: This is really great for camping and tailgating. Everyone loves pizza and everyone can make their own. The size makes it very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza
customer_reviews.text: This pizza oven makes the best homemade pizza. Our pizza's only took a few minutes to cook. You can only cook one pizza at a time. The flavor is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A total hit!
customer_reviews.text: My. Husband. Adores this!! He makes the dough from scratch and we give our kids a portion each to make their pizzas anyway they like. The individual sizes cook in like 3 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who loves to make his own pizza. This thing is the best especially for keeping it cool in the house as an alternative to the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best purchase I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best purchase I have ever made. The crusts come out perfectly cooked and the pizzas are amazing! I am able to make one pizza every 5-8 mins... Perfect product!
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pizza just like the Parlor makes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pizza ovens we travel to a lot of drag races our race trailer has living quarters so we stay at the track it's nice to have fresh made pizza these things get to 700 degrees pizza crust is nice and crispy on the edges the way we like it
customer_reviews.author: FJR

customer_reviews.title: cooks hot
customer_reviews.text: we like the quick hot cooking, but takes a bit to learn how to use it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Various Woodpecker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pizza maker
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use cornmeal so pizza moves off pizza peel easily.make sure it's not windy out it keeps the flame down.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: works fantastic takes a bit of practice but you can cook almost anything not just pizza in it wings meatball etcetera just use skillet
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Hartup

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza
customer_reviews.text: This little oven works great. If you order special pizza dough the pizza is outstanding, we rarely go out for pizza. We bought the stand too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brick oven at home
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my father's birthday and it makes delicious pizza. Technique takes a while to get the hang of, because its hard to get your pizza off the peel and onto the stone. By the third pizza we figured it out. Kids love selecting their toppings and minutes later having their own home made pizza.
customer_reviews.author: J. Court

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every pizza lovers dream. Cranked out 10 pizzas for my daughters birthday, took it camping as well as to Nascar (late night pizza after the race!) It is very simple to put together and maintain. Be sure to get both a metal and wooden pizza peel. Go ahead, DO IT! Hit Buy now, if you have a love for your own hand crafted pizza, this will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! My friends have asked to borrow it. Makes pizza quickly! You have to rotate the pizza after a couple of minutes but that no big deal! I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Smallbutfierce

customer_reviews.title: This unit pumps out the heat!
customer_reviews.text: This item came in time and not damaged. I have to say it’s awesome! The thing heated up to close to 9 hundred degrees in less then 5 minutes. I made 7 pizzas on the first use and they came out absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: joe c

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorite "gadgets".
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pizza oven. Easy to use and gets very hot. We love it and would recommend it if you want a very hot pizza oven, but don't want to pay for the very expensive options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  Why didn't I get it sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this years ago. We love making pizza but it takes over half an hour in the oven. With this oven pizzas come out in 6 minutes and taste so much better. Get a pizza peel to go with it. It'll pay itself off in a weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Natym

customer_reviews.title: Reproduces the Brick Oven pizza experience at home much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Reproduces the Brick Oven pizza experience at home much better than I expected. The kids love it! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pizza oven. Cooks in 6 minutes. There are some great pizza crusts mixes out there. Try Kroger for DeLallo Italian Pizza Dough Kit. It makes 4 pizza crust.
customer_reviews.author: Melcul

customer_reviews.title: This product really does a great job and is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Searched for pizza ovens for a long time. This product really does a great job and is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kris G

customer_reviews.title: Great camping addition
customer_reviews.text: Best addition of the year to our camping experience. We can make 8-10 pizzas in about an hour and the entire family loves pizza night at the campground. In-Laws considering one of their own
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hazard
customer_reviews.text: Ours has lite one time and that's it. It tells you to do all these troubleshooting things. The one time it did light, it caused a small explosion inside oven.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Thanks. Very good oven. Easy to install. Easy to use. 100 percent recomend this oven.
customer_reviews.author: ricardo prada

customer_reviews.title: Great lityle pizza oven for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed for the price. We now make pizza at least once a week!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Get A Splatter Screen
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little item. The only thing that was difficult was putting the pizza into the PizzaQue from the peel. This was solved when one reviewer mentioned using a splatter screen. Went to Walmart and got a splatter screen that was the correct size to fit into the pizza que. I placed the pizza on the splatter screen supported by the peel and inserted both into the Que. When positioned correctly slide the peel away and leave the splatter screen directly on top of the stone. After about 4 minutes you can pull the splatter screen and pizza out and the pizza will come right off of the screen. Rotate the pizza and finish cooking the pizza directly on the stone.
customer_reviews.author: Upcountry

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct item shipped
customer_reviews.text: This is not the correct description for this product. I’ve sent 2 back as it does not come with the leg kit as advertised. In addition there are parts missing needed for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: JH89179

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Pizza
customer_reviews.text: This gift exceeded my expectations, and then some. This pizza oven makes pizzeria quality pizza, so long as you can stretch out a nice dough. I would recommend to anyone planning on buying dough that you use half a dough per pizza. It is the perfect size and allows for a crispy crust. One thing to note is that there is no peel included, so make sure you buy a narrow one to use with this oven.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quick pizzas better than takeout
customer_reviews.text: High temperatures for a crispy crust, portable enough for tailgating or apartments. What is not to love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pizzacraft PC6503 PizzaQue Outdoor Pizza Oven & Pizza Oven Leg Kit
product_meta.description: Style:Pizza Oven + Leg KitThe Pizzacraft pizzas portable outdoor pizza oven is perfect for your regular family pizza night at home, or take it with you tailgating, camping, the beach – anywhere you crave delicious homemade pizza. Although this portable, light weight pizza oven can sit on any stable surface, This set includes the PC6500 pizzas pizza oven & the PC6011 pizza oven Leg kit – a stand that lifts your pizza oven about 3.5' Off the ground & has a tank rest. Operating on a 20 lb propane tank, The pizzas heats to over 700F in 15 Min & will cook your handcrafted creations to crispy perfection in 6 Min – hotter, faster, & better than your kitchen oven. All without the size & expense of a high-end wood-burning backyard pizza oven. The included 14” cordierite pizza stone delivers even heat to cook your crust quickly, & the cheese & toppings cook At the same rate thanks to the domed lid which reflects heat back down to the top of the pie. There is an easy-to-read thermometer at the top to monitor cooking Temp, & Vents so any moisture can escape, leaving you with perfectly cooked pizza in only 6 Min. Your pizzas does not need to reheat Between pizzas – keep cooking & delighting family & friends Pie after Pie. One 20 lb tank will last for 25 cooking hours – that's over 250 pizzas! Pizzacraft offers a full line of tools & accessories to use with your pizzas pizza oven – from pizza peels & wheels to wood chips to enhance your pies with smoky flavor – We are the portable pizza oven people!
feature_bullets: Set includes PizzaQue portable pizza oven PC6500 and leg kit PC6011
Pizzaque oven Pre-heats to 700F in 15 minutes, pizza cooks in only 6 minutes
Heat-diffusing pizza stone cooks crust evenly, domed lid deflects heat to cook top
Light weight, portable – take anywhere you want homemade pizza
Built in thermometer, moisture vent, and gas hose included
Operates on a standard 20 lb. Propane tank
Leg kit lifts oven approximately 3.5 feet off the ground

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars395 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
